description:
Your best friend wants to cheer you up, so he tries his best to make a dungeon for you to explore. Explore his wholesome, weird-as-heck, scrappy rogue-lite oozing with charm and humor for 1-2 Players.

Sick Features:
Daily Run Twists: Once per day you can compete globally to get the highest score. Every day a new twist will be introduced to shaken up the formula.
-Local CO-OP
-10 Dungeons
-150+ different Upgrades/Curses/Weapons/Quests/Daily Twists. With so many stack able passives interacting with each other it'll take years to see every combination.
-Hugging Simulator
-5 Modes
-Branching paths, get as greedy as much as you want, do you want to trade all your max health and become a glass cannon? Why the heck not!
-True Ending (It's a mystery to us all)
name: Wally and the FANTASTIC PREDATORS
